data.title: Classic posters:Lenica,Cieslewicz,W.& St.Zamecznik,Mlodozeniec
data.text:
Tadeusz Trepkowski (1914-1954)

Author : Tadeusz Trepkowski

Poster : "OSTATNI ETAP", 1948

B1 vertical = 26.4" x 38.4" (67 x 97.5 cm), color offset

Reissued 1958 : A1 vertical = 23" x 33" (58.5 x 84 cm), color offset

Recent price : $ 1400,very rare

Beware of a late 80 s reproduction

Film : "Ostatni etap", Polish

Directed by Wanda Jakubowska

Starring : Barbara Drapinska, Zofia Mrozowska, Alina Janowska

Henryk Tomaszewski (1914-2005)

Author : Henryk Tomaszewski

Poster : "CZYSTE SZALENSTWO", 1959

A1 vertical = 23" x 33" (58.5 x 84 cm), 5-color offset

Signed : H.T.

Recent price : 1000, rare

Film : "Hellzapoppin'", US (Universal), 1941

Directed by Henry Codman Potter

Starring : Ole Olsen, Chick Johnson, Martha Raye

Author : Henryk Tomaszewski

Poster : "LUNATYCY", 1959

A1 vertical : 24" x 33.3" (61 x 84.5 cm), color offset

Value : $ 500

Film : Poland (Kamera)

Directed by Bohdan Poreba

Starring : Stanislaw Jasiukiewicz, Ludwik Pak, Andrzej Nowakowski, Zofia Marcinkowska

Author : Henryk Tomaszewski

Poster : "TYSIAC TALAROW", 1959

A1 horizontal = 33.7" x 22.8" (85.5 x 58 cm), color offset

Value : $ 800 +, rare

Film : Poland (Start), 1960

Directed by Stanislaw Wohl

Starring : Barbara Kwiatkowska, Bronislaw Pawlik, Irena Kwiatkowska, Aleksander Dzwonkowski, Jarema Stepowski, Czeslaw Roszkowski

Author : Henryk Tomaszewski

Poster : "PIERWSZE DNI", 1952

B1 vertical = 27.2" x 39.4" (69 x 100 cm), color offset

Reissued 1959 : B2 vertical = 19.2" x 26.4" (48.8 x 67 cm), color offset

Value : $ 900 +, rare

Film : Poland (WFF Lodz)

Directed by Jan Rybkowski

Starring : Jan Ciecierski, Hanna Bielicka, Kazimierz Opalinski, Jan Swiderski

Wojciech Zamecznik (1923-1967)

Author : Wojciech Zamecznik

Poster : "SOS TITANIC", 1961

A1 vertical = 23" x 33" (59 x 84 cm), 4-color offset

Recent price : $ 1500, rare

Film : "A Night to Remember", British (W. Mac Quitty - J.Arthur Rank), 1958

Directed by Roy Baker

Starring : Kenneth More, Laurence Naismith, David McCallum

Author : Wojciech Zamecznik

Poster : "LOTNA", 1959

2 x A1 = A0 horizontal (2 x A1 v.) = 46" x 33" (117 x 84 cm), color offset

Signed : "WZ 55"

Value : $ 2000 , very rare

Film : Poland (Kadr)

Directed by Andrzej Wajda

Starring : Jerzy Pichelski, Adam Pawlikowski, Bozena Kurowska, Jerzy Moes

Author : Wojciech Zamecznik

Poster : "ESKAPADA", 1957

A1 vertical = 23" x 33" (59 x 84 cm), color offset

Circulation : 9500

Value : $ 600 +

Film : "Escapade", Britain (Pinnacle Productions), 1955

Directed by Philip Leacock

Starring : John Mills, Yvonne Mitchell

Author : Wojciech Zamecznik

Poster : "CELULOZA", 1954. Reprinted 1979

A1 horizontal = 33" x 23" (84 x 59 cm), color rotogravure

Circulation : 5000

Value : $ 1000 +, rare

Film : Poland (WFF Lodz)

Directed by Jerzy Kawalerowicz

Starring : Jozef Nowak, Stanislaw Milski, Zdzislaw Skowronski, Teresa Szmigielowna

Author : Wojciech Zamecznik

Poster : "KOBIETA W OKNIE", 1958

A1 vertical = 23" x 33" (59 x 84 cm), color offset

Recent price : $ 600

Film : "The Woman in the Window", US (William Goetz - RKO Radio Pictures), 1944

Directed by Fritz Lang

Starring : Edward G.Robinson, Joan Bennett

Author : Wojciech Zamecznik

Poster : "MIASTO NIEUJARZMIONE", 1950

A1 vertical = 23" x 33" (58.5 x 84 cm), color offset

2 versions

Value : $ 700 +, rare

Film : Poland (WFF Lodz)

Directed by Jerzy Zarzycki

Starring : Jan Kurnakowicz, Zofia Mrozowska, Igor Smialowski, Jerzy Rakowiecki, Wieniamin Trusieniew

Author : Wojciech Zamecznik

Poster : "NIEDOKONCZONA OPOWIESC", 1956

A1+ vertical : 23" x 34" (59 x 86 cm), color offset

Circulation : 4260

Signed : WZ 56

Value : $ 900 +, very rare

Film : "Nieokonczonnaja powiest" / 'Unfinished Story'/ , SU (Lenfilm), 1955

Directed by Fridrich Ermler

Starring : Eliza Bystricka, Sergei Bondarczuk, Eugeniusz Samojlow

Author : Wojciech Zamecznik

Poster : "OSTATNI STRZAL", 1958

A1 vertical = 23" x 33" (59 x 84 cm), color offset

Signed : W.Z.58

Recent price : $ 550

Film : Poland (ZAF Rytm)

Directed by Jan Rybkowski

Starring : Stanislaw Jasiukiewicz, Emil Karewicz, Urszula Modrzynska, Cezary Julski

Author : Wojciech Zamecznik

Poster : "WICEHRABIA DE BRAGELONNE", 1959

A1 vertical = 23" x 33" (59 x 84 cm), color offset

Unsigned

Value : $ 500 +

Film : "Il Visconte di Bragelonne" , France / Italy (Orso Film - Iris Film), 1954

Directed by Fernando Cerchio

Starring : Georges Marchal, Dawn Addams, Florence Arnaud, Jacques Dumesnil

Stanislaw Zamecznik (1923-1967)

Author : Stanislaw Zamecznik

Poster : "KRZYK", 1960

A1 vertical = 23" x 33" (59 x 84 cm), color offset

Unsigned

Recent price : $ 750, rare

Film : "Il Grido" / 'The Cry'/ , Italy (S.P.A. Cinematografica - Robert Alexander Productions), 1957

Directed by Michelangelo Antonioni

Starring : Steve Cochran, Betsy Blair, Alida Valli, Gabrielle Pallotti

Author : Stanislaw Zamecznik

Poster : "CO SIE ZDARZYLO BABY JANE ?", 1965

A1 vertical = 23" x 33" (59 x 84 cm), color offset

Circulation : 4200

Unsigned

Recent price : $ 400

Film : "What Ever Happened to Baby Jane", US (Warner Bros.), 1962

Directed by Robert Aldrich

Starring : Bette Davis, Joan Crawford, Marjorie Bennett, Victor Buono, Anna Lee

Jan Mlodozeniec (1929-2000)

Author : Jan Mlodozeniec

Poster : "ZAKAZANY OWOC", 1959

A1 horizontal = 33" x 23" (84 x 58.5 cm)

Value : $ 1200 +, very rare

Film : "Le Fruit defendu", France (Gray Film), 1952

Directed by Henri Verneuil

Starring : Francoise Arnoul, Fernandel, Claude Nollier, Sylvie
